name: writefreely
description: WriteFreely is a minimalist, self-hosted blogging and writing platform. It supports multiple users, federated ActivityPub publishing, clean typography, and privacy-focused configuration for communities or individuals.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write in a distraction-free Markdown editor focused on content over formatting

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Host multiple writers on a single instance with individual blogs or shared publications

features.title: Activitypub Federation
features.description: Publish posts to the fediverse so followers on Mastodon and other platforms can read them

features.title: Custom Domains
features.description: Map personal domains to individual blogs for professional branding

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: No tracking, ads, or analytics by default to respect reader and writer privacy

features.title: Anonymous Posting
features.description: Allow writers to publish without requiring accounts or personal information

features.title: Clean Typography
features.description: Present content with readable fonts and layouts optimized for long-form reading

features.title: Rss Feeds
features.description: Automatically generate RSS feeds for each blog so readers can subscribe via feed readers
